description: 23L Capacity: Suitable for families with 3 to 4 members
Convection: Can be used for baking along with grilling, reheating, defrosting and cooking
IFB offers a super warranty 1 year on Microwave Oven & 3 years on magnetron & cavity
Control: Touch Key Pad (Membrane) is sensitive to touch and easy to clean
No. of Programmes: Multi Stage Cooking, Grill Mode, Auto Defrost, Auto Reheat, Delay Start, Combination Cooking (Grill + Microwave), Express Cooking
Child Safety Lock: Ensures complete safety especially for homes with young children
Special features: 71 Standard Menus, steam clean, Disinfect, Deodorize, Overheating Protection, Sensor Malfunction Protection, Digital Clock, Timer Option
